Procedure: Start and observe running. Open test valve to simulate water flow when start testing fire pump.
Start generator and run for 10 minutes under no load. Check oil level and coolant.
Run generator for 30 minutes under 30% load. Check all gauges and alarms.
Full load test and transfer switch test.
Check refrigerant levels and compressor operation.
Clean condenser coils and check electrical connections.
Full system performance test and refrigerant leak check.
Inspect cables safety devices and run tests.
